alert.note: Alert for Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Palm Beach County through 345 PM EDT... At 300 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Lion Country Safari Park, or 10 miles east of Canal Point, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... West Palm Beach, Wellington, Palm Beach Gardens, Belle Glade, South Bay, Greenacres, Royal Palm Beach, Loxahatchee NWR, Belle Glade Camp, Golden Lakes, North County Airport, Loxahatchee Groves, Lion Country Safari Park, The Acreage, Fremd Village-Padgett Island, Aberdeen, Aberdeen Golf Course, Caloosa, Florida Gardens and Boca Raton Equestrian. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County
